summary: In a village where girls don't play cricket, Veera puts on a turban and beard and becomes Veer to fulfill her dreams and meets Rohan. And fun begins.
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Rani Mukerji|Anupam Kher|Dalip Tahil|Rakhi Sawant|Sherlyn Chopra|Shri Vallabh Vyas|Vrajesh Hirjee|Poonam Dhillon|Shonali Nagrani|Karan Veer|Bobby Bedii|Vicky Ahuja|Sherry Rekhi|Akhilesh Sharma|Vimarsh Roshan|Kunal Satyen|Feroz Khan|Rashid Mallick|Jaffar Baig|Prasad Patil|Imran Khan|Saud Ansari|Mukesh Singh|Nasir Khan|Vikas Choudhry|Niranjan Sawant|Vineet Kapoor|Amar Singh|Pawan Singh|Megha Narkar
keywords: woman in a men's room|cricket the sport|coach|reference to the beatles|fireworks
title: Dil Bole Hadippa!
